short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This adds defaults to Marrs reservation screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension offers extra features to the Marrs application for the Stanford Graduate School of Business. This is to be used for beta testing and expect features to change and maybe not work as new versions are updated.

Current Features
* Moves required fields to the front reservation screen so reservations can happen quicker.
* Searches the rooms on first load so you can see what is available right away.
* Remembers if the show favorite rooms checkbox was checked or not.
* When selecting a template you can click on the name of the template also instead of having to click "Book Now"
